website_summaries.verdict: This bike won't work for everyone, but it's great for couples or a pair of friends who want to cruise along the coastline together.
pros: Fun to ride and great for coasting
Has an attractive design with a beach-appropriate bright orange paint job
7 speeds give you the extra boost for tackling slopes
cons: A few bikes arrived with missing or damaged pieces
Quite heavy and a bit pricey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase, get it and get out there!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand why there are bad reviews. You have to understand what you are buying and take some responsibility for yourself. Think about it, you are buy a tadum bike for around $200,shipped from overseas in a box. Of course this bike isn’t going to blow your mind. If you are looking for a low cost bike for 2 this is it. Not the highest quality but a great buy if you want to go on an adventure. It’s not hard to build, it took me a 6 pack and a set of Allen wrench’s.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for a Great Proyect in Panamá
customer_reviews.text: Buy these bikes for a social project. Bring blind people to ride a bicycle. With the best result. Today we achieved the objective and we started the project in Panama called "Paseo a Ciegas Panamá", can watch all the project in Facebook and Instagram. Great bikes, we'll soon be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: J. Quiroz

customer_reviews.title: Banana trees!
customer_reviews.text: My son's wanted this so bad. They love it. My oldest is 6' and he can ride comfortably. It was very hilarious the first ride they took because my youngest kept screaming that he couldn't see anything. Totally worth it. But watch the price. When I added it to my list months ago, it was only 179$. I purchased the weekend after Thanksgiving and it was 259$! 👎
customer_reviews.author: mother of ALL

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye bil
customer_reviews.text: I take full ownership for purchasing a used bike. Thought I was getting a deal but what I actually got was a glass of water and Tylenol for the pounding headache, caused attempting to put this bike together If it were just missing parts I could probably give it more stars but it has deep scratches fork is bent, fender is trashed.... Product stated" minor imperfections" quite misleading. Shoulda know from the color in this was going to be a lemon. nt handlebars missing
customer_reviews.author: Idk

customer_reviews.title: big bike
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy nice bike. Well built and arrived in perfect condition. Paint job and palm tree decals are really great. Yellow has a bit of a sparkle to it. Minimal assembly. You will need metric allen wrenches. Yes, it is heavy as other reviews have said but not overly for its size, it is a tandem cruiser = huge.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We live this bike. It met all our expectations. We added a front basket and a pet carrier on the back for our Cavalier King Charles Spaniel. Great fun
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Gentry

customer_reviews.title: This bike is definitely worth purchasing
customer_reviews.text: I would like to start off by saying this is my very first time ever riding a tandem bike it is definitely something to get used to the bike is very sturdy the color is beautiful and bright the assembling was quite simple no dents no mess pieces everything in the box I received it within two days. If possible I will be more than happy to post pictures and videos.
customer_reviews.author: Daliah

customer_reviews.title: Bike was damaged in shipping
customer_reviews.text: When we opened the bike two pieces of the fenders were dented. We had to almost destoy the box to get into it so there is no sending the bike back and we do not want to put it together without the fenders being without dents. I do not know how to get the pictures from my phone to you.. The pictures will show how the box was opened and how the bike is still attached to the box. Obviously I can not give a review of of the product until it is put together and used, which I will be happy to do, when it is put together and we ride it.
customer_reviews.author: shirley

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price. Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. Don't expect to fly on this. It's heavy, but fun. Will need experience putting bikes together. Some parts got loose after first ride and needs mechanical awareness. If not you, then be ready to have bike shop close.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is fun riding this bike at the beach
customer_reviews.text: It is fun riding this bike at the beach. The top tubes are low enough that it is easy to get my leg over the top tube. I didn't like the way the front fender fit, so I just installed it backwards and ... no problem.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Love the bike
customer_reviews.text: Love the bike. Had ripped seat and slightly bent rear fender when it came. I called for replacements. The seat showed up immediately and the rear fender was back ordered. Rear handlebars were too low so we purchased Sunlite CRSR DNO 32wX1.5X1in Black replacement bars and some grips for a total of $25. All good now.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Lenskold

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts and damaged
customer_reviews.text: Zero stars for this, unless someone does something to make it right. Missing all of the pedals, back fender has two big dents, missing rear handle bar clamp. So great Xmas gift for my special needs son. I will never buy a bike from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Yes, you will look stupid on it but who cares
customer_reviews.text: Yes, you and your riding partner will look stupid on this bike. Yes, the person riding in the back will inevitably stop pedaling while going up a hill. Yes, people will laugh at you. Who cares. Buy this bike! It’s a great deal, easy to put together and a ton of fun! Live, laugh, love.
customer_reviews.author: Don Juan de la Nooch

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: This bike was a great buy. Easy to assemble, sturdy and comfortable to ride. Both tires wobbled slightly, but that was quickly remedied by adjusting the spokes. Couldn't be happier! I'm just sorry my outdoor activity season will soon be over. I'll be on it again ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: L. A. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Fun Campsite biking
customer_reviews.text: Bought for husband and I to use while camping with Toyhauler. Back handle bars take some adjusting but still low. Pedal backwards brakes. Must have strength in legs to pedal synchronized. All in all fun.
customer_reviews.author: I Guajardo

customer_reviews.title: Cool Bike
customer_reviews.text: Other than the back fender being bent before arriving, this is a nice bike for the buck. Since I'm a senior and female, I did switch out the seats for bigger and more cushy ones. I also put quick release mechanisms on for seat height adjustments. This is a solid bike and hope it will bring years of fun.
customer_reviews.author: gretchen estelle rebold

customer_reviews.title: Defective parts - Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived defective. The gear set was not correctly aligned and had a manufacturer defect. I have spent the last week trying to repair a brand new product. This bike looks great, it just does not run great at all. 4-Stars for aesthetics, -3 Stars for craftsmanship. I would suggest buying a different tandem or you might need to repair this or have it professionally installed upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Travis

customer_reviews.title: Great bike.
customer_reviews.text: The bike was easy to assemble. The front fender was zip tied to the rear fender with a small piece of insolation between them and also the box. The front fender has a small dent on it due to being packaged so close to the top of the box.(Top dent) Tried to get ahold of customer service but no response due to covid-19. Awesome bike otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Good beach bike
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble .Not a scratch or dent on it .no missing parts.Good looking bike.
customer_reviews.author: Butch

customer_reviews.title: Front Fender doesn't fit; Screws get loose every 2 hours of riding
customer_reviews.text: Front fender doesn't fit, so I had to assemble it without it. I'm going to look into contacting customer support for a replacement. The nuts for the handlebars, both captain and stoker, come lose and have to be tighten with allen wrenches every 2 hours or so. I guess that's why it's so cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Evan C.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Just a cheap ass bike. It’s built cheap. It’s always falling apart and stuff. I regret my purchase. It’s junk. The more you ride the more it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: we are in miami. it is perfect for here. it is heavy, sure, but the land is flat. I can ride it by myself or with my wife. great value for the money. I did pay a bike shop to assy it as I had no tools. we had just moved here. when i ride it by myself, i get a lot of hitchhiker requests.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: A fun bike
customer_reviews.text: This bike is fun to ride, sturdy, and fits 2 adults great! It came packaged very well and was fairly easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy
customer_reviews.text: Nice but it's super heavy and the front bar is high to get leg over to get on to bike. And I have long legs.
customer_reviews.author: ilyR

customer_reviews.title: nice bike, heavy
customer_reviews.text: We refer to this bike as The Yellow Submarine because we own The Abbey Road Boutique...so it was just so fitting....nice bike, heavy, but sturdily made, so far, not complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to install but the chain guard is too flimsy ...
customer_reviews.text: Me and my wife use this bike. It was easy to install but the chain guard is too flimsy and it keeps hitting the chain and it makes a loud noise when riding it
customer_reviews.author: anilumias

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box
customer_reviews.text: Had to return due to a damage box but it looks really cute
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Thrasher

customer_reviews.title: Okay for family rides but not more
customer_reviews.text: I love the style of this bike but it is very heavy and has to take very wide turns. It’s fun for trips around the neighborhood but not ideal for long adventure rides.
customer_reviews.author: jefnjod

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy, wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy, wobbly and seat was missing. Bought a new seat and returning it now
customer_reviews.author: Angela Aronosn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bike
customer_reviews.text: Is very good and beautiful bike but for my husband and me it so heavy because we are seniors ☺
customer_reviews.author: Anamaria Martins

customer_reviews.title: Not a good bike
customer_reviews.text: Bulky, damaged, doesn’t work correctly. But a different tandem bike!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy, super fun!
customer_reviews.text: My siblings and I all pitched in to get our parents this tandem bike for their anniversary and they love it! They take it in long rides at least 12 miles and up and down hills. Super sturdy, super fun!
customer_reviews.author: Torrie Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bike for under $300! Yes, it is a TANK, but it's not a touring bike. We added a basket, seat adjustment levers, and more comfy seats (not a necessity but my fanny appreciated it). My 9 year old daughter at about 4'2" rides in he back perfectly. We've rented this same bike at the beach and I figured if it can survive that environment it must be pretty durable. Very easy to assemble even for the non-mechanically inclined.
customer_reviews.author: S. HYANS

customer_reviews.title: Missing and damaged parts
customer_reviews.text: I loved the bike, and I believe it will ride just fine, but the back fender came damaged, and I gave it a zero for assembly because it came missing a seat post which is why I have not had a chance to ride it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun bike...small fix needed
customer_reviews.text: I dropped one star on this because the back fender rubs on the tire. I removed the tire and tightened, but it continues to loosen. The screw doesn’t have enough strength to hold it in place. Overall my 11 year old loves this bike though!
customer_reviews.author: David A

customer_reviews.title: Bike arrived with a flat front tire, would not ...
customer_reviews.text: Bike arrived with a flat front tire, would not hold air. Had to replace tube. On the first ride the front drive sprocket fell off. Apparently who ever put it together must have used an impact wrench, nut was cross threaded. Really messed up the threads on crank shaft. Tried rethreading , but probably going to have to replace it
customer_reviews.author: Carl Willis

customer_reviews.title: COMPLETELY BROKEN PIECE OF JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk that got lost the first time, then came late, and came completely broken! It's so heavy I won't even be able to return it to UPS. EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED : (
customer_reviews.author: Irena

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this with my hubby so we could bike the 4.5mi to work... we could barely make it out of our driveway because of the front person's feet hitting the tire when turning (only toes were on pedals). Reverse pedal for brakes was about the only redeeming quality besides the subtle glitter in the paint job. I returned mine.
customer_reviews.author: H.Cross

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for our granddaughter and everyone loved it. An inner tube was faulty but easy to replace. Lots of fun for all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly and great value
customer_reviews.text: The bike came partially assembled so to finish it was not difficult, the bike is very sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great ride
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great, just need to get use to riding tandem bike . It’s for me and my wife
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the bike got for my wife
customer_reviews.text: Love the bike got for my wife. Only issue is the box came and it was a little beat up. The frame had a scuff and the one seat was ripped other than that it was great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: As long as you have tool kits to assemble it, it would perform well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun bike but need a seat post!
customer_reviews.text: Help! I’m missing a seat post. How can I get one??
customer_reviews.author: raj Sutaria

customer_reviews.title: We were very happy with our purchase of this yellow bicycle
customer_reviews.text: We were very happy with our purchase of this yellow bicycle
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Fun to ride. Get smiles from others as we pass by.
customer_reviews.author: LVJ

customer_reviews.title: Great bike at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great bike at a great price. I did have to have the my handyman re-tighten the back fender, done by the factory. Involved taking off that wheel too. But now we have a tight, fun bike!
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Spagle

customer_reviews.title: Not always what it seems
customer_reviews.text: Item is great. Beware of this order. Parts are missing. I had to tear up the box to look for bolts and nuts.
customer_reviews.author: SAM C.

customer_reviews.title: but that is because my highly intelligent husband put it together while I sat on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bike for Christmas for my very handsome husband and I to take rides around the neighborhood. It was a snap to put together, but that is because my highly intelligent husband put it together while I sat on the couch. Our first ride was fantastic, mostly because my highly capable husband was on the front doing all the work of steering and pedaling while I was sitting enjoying the view. We have taken it out about a dozen times and we love it. Very sturdy. Very good deal.
customer_reviews.author: msw

customer_reviews.title: ours is solid & fun to ride
customer_reviews.text: Don't have whatever problems previous post has, ours is solid & fun to ride.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Rawlings

product_meta.title: Kulana Lua Tandem Adult Beach Cruiser Bike, 26-Inch Wheels, Single to 7-Speeds, Multiple Colors
product_meta.description: Take the fun of cycling to a new level with the Kulana Lua Tandem Bike! This stylish bicycle for two features a Hi-Ten steel cruiser frame in a cheerful yellow with beachy palm tree graphics. The single-speed drive train makes this tandem bike easy to use and maintain, while the coaster brakes provide reliable all-weather stopping. Large, comfortable cruiser saddles and easy-reach handlebars put you in a comfortable, upright riding position - so all you have to do is relax and enjoy the ride. As an added bonus, whitewall tires with both front and rear fenders add to the laid-back vintage charm. Don’t let summer pass you by without saying aloha to the Kulana Lua Tandem Bike. | Great news! If you select Site to Store delivery, you can call your local store as complimentary assembly may be offered at that location.
feature_bullets: Cruise the neighborhood or beach on this steel tandem frame. Fits two riders 5’4” to 6’2”
Oversized fork and breezy, beachy style make for a picture-perfect ride
Torque Drive 7 speed twist shifters make it easy to adapt to your terrain
Front and rear v-brakes deliver reliable stopping power
Kulana cruiser handlebars and high-rise stems create a comfortable upright riding position

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
